caption.center: RICHARD H. BLAISDELL, Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant vs. STATE OF HAWAII,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (S.P.P. NO. 99-0005 (Cr. Nos. 90-1541/92-2513))
opinion.attorneys: Richard H. Blaisdell, pro se, on the writ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER GRANTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI
Upon consideration of the application for a writ of certiorari filed on June 6, 2001 by Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant Richard H. Blaisdell, the same is hereby granted.
